name: Debonair Designs Limited
description:
Debonair Designs is a design and build company who are passionate about creating sustainable and eco-friendly homes. We don’t just see ourselves as an architecture and construction business, but as a team of people committed to making a real difference in our industry. 


Visit our ECO showroom to experience our full range of sustainable and future-proof designs.
• New and traditional builds
• Loft conversions
• Basement excavation
• Extensions

Debonair offers a full range of architectural and constructional services.

To discover the possibilities of your property, contact us to arrange an appointment at our showroom.

product_images.title: Extensions
product_images.description: At Debonair Designs we know life is always changing, and that sometimes this means our buildings need to change with it. Building extensions can recreate a home, eliminating the need to find somewhere new. From single room to full floor extensions Debonair Design’s experienced team of architects and builders will develop a space that not only matches but also enhances your property.

product_images.title: New builds
product_images.description: Our dedicated team can turn an idea into a reality. We know everybody and every home is different, which is reflected in our work. We work with our clients from the initial design process through to the final stages of construction on new and traditional builds to create a property that is personal to you.

product_images.title: Green roofs
product_images.description: Green roof is a great idea for your home- it looks great and give this natural, eco feeling to your house

product_images.title: Lofts
product_images.description: Loft conversions add new space and value to your home. They give you the opportunity to enhance a property on the inside without taking away from the building exterior and grounds. Whether it’s a new bedroom, office or playroom, Debonair Designs work with our clients to release the full potential of their loft space.

product_images.title: The Eco Showroom
product_images.description: For convince of our customers we created The ECO Showroom where you can take a look at latest ideas and products and get professional advice about building eco friendly home
